name: COMPETITION 1000
notes:
Intended as IOR 1/2 ton racer. 
A strip planked prototype also came from this builder. 
Sven Svendsen's Boat Works was located at Alameda, CA.
Dimension shown are only intended to show general characteristics of this yacht.
We have not seen any reliable documentation from the designer or builder.
Thanks to 'Flick' and a number of others for providing what little we have.
